Title: Provides for a disability retirement for certain deputy sheriff members of a retirement system in certain cities
Summary: Provides for a line of duty disability presumption for any condition of impairment of health caused by diseases of the lung, resulting in total or partial disability or death of certain deputy sheriff members of a retirement system in certain cities.
LawCode: Add ยง207-r, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to disabilities of deputy sheriff members of a retirement system in certain cities
